verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Eledumare
Arugbo ojo
Onyedikagi, onyedikagi
Eledumare
Arugbo ojo
Onyedikagi, onyedikagi

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Onye eh, onyedikagi
Arugbo ojo, onyedikagi
Onye eh, onyedikagi
Arugbo ojo, onyedikagi

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Elohim Adonai
Ah Ah Ah Ah
Eh Eh Eh Eh
Elohim!

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Through eternal ages let His praises ring,
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing,
Standing on the promises ... standing...
